title: Fearing ICE crackdown, immigrants nationally are avoiding treatment, sometimes with dire consequences
description: Doctors nationally are describing harrowing consequences for patients who put off medical care because of fears of ICE.
content: Doctors nationally are describing harrowing consequences for patients who put off medical care because of fears of ICE.
